name: Gangstar Rio: City of Saints
summary: Gangstar Rio: City of Saints is an open-world crime game. It is also the fourth installment of Gangstar Series. According to the plot you should play for a criminal, not wishing to reckon with standards of the law and public morals. You can shoot, drive around the city in the stolen cars, be involved in criminal fights. The action of the game happens in Rio de Janeiro. There are more than 60 various tasks plus a set of casual events. Also in the game there’s a postscoring of weapon and cars.
